name: Fitness Club 3D
description:
Need some motivation to hit the gym? What if you owned it?

Every workout counts when you’re trying to build an empire. Help your clients achieve their dream body and fitness goals, while you upgrade your studio to the best gym on earth.

Clients need help with everything from weight adjustments to form correction and with you as their health guru, they’re sure to look their best in no time.

Fitness Club 3D Features:
- Realistic workout simulations
- Unlimited upgrade combinations
- Tons of energy building mini-games
